translate: 那是一个巨大的悲痛时期，但在这场灾难中，新的生命得以绽放

original: For from the soil beneath which the lost legions lay an abundance of crimson red flowers sprouted forth
translate: 从那些失落军团埋骨之地的土壤中，长出了大量的深红色花朵

original: Flowers that, it is said, will only grow upon the graves of those fallen in battle
translate: 据说，这些花朵只会在阵亡战士的坟墓上生长

original: To the river I will go,
To soothe a heart that’s full of woe,
translate: 安慰那颗充满忧伤的心，

original: For in the water’s cool embrace
translate: 因为在水的凉爽怀抱中

original: My true self I will face
When we have sown our fields
For context and comaprison, I have taken the opportunity of adding the transcript of a fruit farmer's tirade to the local magistrate on the issue of the potatoe-related agricultural reforms
translate: 为了提供背景和对比，我有机会添加了一位水果农民对当地法官关于马铃薯相关农业改革的怒斥的转录

original: If I receive one more decree commanding me to re-sow my fruit orchards into bloody potato fields!
translate: 如果再收到一份命令我重新播种果园成该死的马铃薯田的命令！

original: I’m going to send him a bag full of my ripest manure!
translate: 我要把一袋我最成熟的粪肥送给他！

original: Bloody Magi, making a mess of the world and leaving it to us lot to clean it up!
translate: 该死的术士，把世界弄得一团糟，然后让我们来清理！

original: They can shove their bloody seed-potatoes up their sacred arses for all I bleeding care!
translate: 他们可以把该死的马铃薯种子塞到他们神圣的屁眼里！我根本不在乎！

original: In the year of 641 GA, after the lay-Countess of Vaul lost her firstborn to dry lung, it is rumored that she locked herself up in her chambers to wallow in her grief
translate: 在641年GA，瓦尔领地的世俗女伯爵失去她的长子后得了干肺病，据说她把自己关在房间里沉浸在悲痛中

original: One of the lay-Countess's most important offices was as head of the High Forum, and thus, fearing her absence would cause much unrest amongst nobility, the countess’ majordomo sought help from a wise old crone
translate: 世俗女伯爵最重要的职务之一是高论坛的负责人，因此，担心她的缺席会引起贵族们的不安，女伯爵的管家向一位智老巫婆求助

original: After hearing her plea, the crone handed the countess’ majordomo a single, violet coloured flower
translate: 听完她的恳求后，巫婆递给女伯爵的管家一朵紫色的花

original: Place this beside her bed, and to it all her sorrow shall be fed
translate: 把这朵花放在她的床边，所有的悲伤都会被它吞噬

original: Desperate, the countess’ majordomo did as the crone advised, and less than a tide later, the lay-Countess of Vaul left her chambers for the first time since the loss of her child
translate: 痛苦不堪的女伯爵的管家照着巫婆的建议做了，不到一个潮汐，瓦尔领地的世俗女伯爵自失去孩子后第一次离开了房间

original: The tale was quickly passed between courtiers, and ever since, the fauna - aptly named ‘Sorroweater’ - has been given as a gift in times of great sorrow
translate: 这个故事很快在宫廷中流传开来，从那以后，这种被称为“悲伤吞噬者”的生物在遭遇巨大悲痛时就被作为礼物赠送

original: The High Forum of 641 was indeed a great success
translate: 641年的高论坛确实取得了巨大成功

original: As so often when the lay-nobility conveens, much was discussed, little was decided and nothing was accomplished save gluttony, fornication and a stabbing or two
translate: 就像世俗贵族们聚会时经常发生的那样，讨论了很多，但决定很少，唯一的结果就是暴饮暴食、放纵和几起刺杀事件

original: Despite its beautiful appearance, the legend on the origin of the Starflower is a grim one
translate: 尽管它外观美丽，但星花的起源传说却相当凄惨

original: Many centuries ago, before Gallina came from the south, a fatally wounded warrior lay dying
translate: 在加利娜从南方到来之前，许多世纪前，一名重伤的战士奄奄一息

original: He pleaded to the Gods for help just as a shooting star passed through the sky
translate: 他恳求诸神给予帮助，就在这时，一颗流星划过天空

original: Hearing his cries and taking pity on the young man, the star descended to earth to answer his prayers
translate: 听到他的呼喊并怜悯这位年轻人，流星降落到地面，回应了他的祷告

original: At first the soldier was grateful, but he became smitten by her beauty and soon grew lustful
translate: 开始时，这名士兵心存感激，但很快他被她的美貌所吸引，变得淫欲横生

original: Then possessive and finally cruel towards the stellar being
translate: 接着变得占有欲强，最后对这位天体生物变得残忍

original: She refused him, claiming that stars belong to all who love them and the soldier went mad with rage
translate: 她拒绝了他，声称星星属于所有爱他们的人，士兵因此怒火中烧

original: He strangled her then and there for if he could not have her, no one would
translate: 他当场掐死了她，因为他不能拥有她，就不会有其他人能拥有她

original: As the star’s last breath left her, her Sisters began to weep
translate: 当星星的最后一口气离开她时，她的姐妹们开始哭泣

original: In a shower of burning light, their tears fell to the earth where the star lay, immolating the man who had killed her
translate: 在一场燃烧的光芒中，她们的眼泪落在了地上，将那名杀死她的士兵焚毁

original: When dawn finally broke and the stars withdrew, all that was left in their wake was a field of star-shaped flowers
translate: 当黎明终于来临，星辰退去，留下的只是一片由星星形状的花朵组成的田野

original: This bright fauna was first discovered in the province of Gorremia following one of the worst winters in the region’s history
translate: 这种明亮的生物是在戈雷米亚省首次被发现的，那里的历史记载着有史以来最严酷的冬天之一

original: It is reported that after months of unrelenting snow and ice, the land in this region had become so barren the locals worried new life would never grow from it again
translate: 据报道，在连续几个月的暴风雪和严寒之后，这片土地变得如此荒芜，当地人担心新的生命将永远不会在这片土地上生长

original: Fearing the worst, a handful of villagers decided to seek out new homes, and set out with heavy hearts to begin the long journey to the temperate Heartlands
translate: 担心最坏的情况，一群村民决定寻找新的家园，怀着沉重的心情踏上了前往温暖心腹地的漫长旅程

original: It was at this moment, as the villagers braced themselves to leave their lives behind, that a single ray of sunlight broke through the clouds to light the barren area before them
translate: 就在这一刻，当村民们准备告别他们的生活时，一道阳光穿透云层，照亮了这片荒芜的土地

original: Breaths held, the villagers watched as that sliver of sunlight thawed the icy ground, unveiling the beginnings of a single, yellow bud
translate: 人们屏住呼吸，看着那道阳光融化了冰冻的地面，揭示了第一个黄色花蕾的开始

original: A bud that, to this day, has only ever been found to grow in areas of direct sunlight
translate: 一个花蕾，直到今天，它只在直接阳光照射的地方被发现过

original: We’re working long hours into the night to deal with the recent influx of corpses
translate: 我们整夜工作以应对最近涌入的尸体

original: What compels these people to act so cruelly?
translate: 什么驱使这些人如此残忍地行事？

original: Yesterday we had the corpse of a young boy of no more than 12 years come in
translate: 昨天我们收到了一个不到12岁男孩的尸体

original: He had been beaten to death by the looks of it
translate: 看起来是被人殴打致死的

original: Sacred dead preserve me - were it not for the calling, I’m not sure I would have persevered
translate: 圣灵保佑我 - 要不是使命感，我真不一定能坚持下去

original: Brother Aruun came running up from the crypt, so frightened he had pissed his robes
translate: 哥哥阿鲁恩从墓穴中冲出来，吓得裤子都湿了

original: He claimed he saw something move down in the crypt
translate: 他说他在墓穴里看到什么东西在动

original: We laughed till we fell over and by the end, so did he
translate: 我们笑得东倒西歪，最后他也笑了

original: No doubt he saw one of the rats but it’s funny where the mind wanders when sleep becomes scarce
translate: 毫无疑问，他看到的只是一只老鼠，但当睡眠变得稀缺时，思绪会飘向奇怪的地方

original: Something is wrong in the village!
They say some kind of riot has broken out
translate: 有人说发生了某种暴动

original: Hierophant Leios said Driina has gone to investigate and that we monks should stay in the crypt for our own safety
translate: 神职人员里奥斯说，德里娜已经去调查了，让我们这些僧侣留在墓穴里以确保安全

original: We try to pass the time with work but I wish we knew what was happening
translate: 我们试图通过工作打发时间，但我们都想知道发生了什么

original: They came from the lower crypts!
All are dead save me and brother Aruun!
translate: 只剩下我和哥哥阿鲁恩还活着！

original: We have locked ourselves in the storage room
translate: 我们把自己锁在储藏室里
这些怪物为何还能行走？

original: There is no light in the afterlife!
I dare not leave this room - I hear them outside
translate: 我不敢离开这间房 - 我听到外面有动静

original: A ragged letter that seems to contain direction of some sort
translate: 一份破烂的信件，似乎包含某种方向

original: Enter the sewers from the harbor through the westernmost outlet
translate: 从港口通过最西端的出口进入下水道

original: Follow the chalk arrows on the wall and make your way east past the central cistern and then south
translate: 沿着墙上的白垩箭头前进，向东经过中央蓄水池，然后向南

original: From there you’ll find a stairs going down and into the Rat-Maze
translate: 从那里你会找到通往地下的阶梯，进入鼠穴迷宫

original: In the maze, go W, S, S, W, W and you’ll find yourself in the Underhalls
translate: 在迷宫中，向西，向南，向南，再向西，向西，你会发现自己在地下大厅

original: Mind your manners while you’re there and be sure to peruse the Black Market
translate: 在那里注意礼貌，并务必浏览黑市

original: A journal that was kept by the ship surgeon of the Zephyr
translate: 这是海风号船上的外科医生所记的日记

original: Written on the day of departure from the mainland
translate: 写于离开大陆的那一天

original: Left Adler's Helm today with a full complement of passengers
translate: 今天离开了阿德勒的舵轮，满载乘客

original: Mercenaries by the looks of it
Ship was dispatched by Guild before we could fully restock medical supplies
translate: 船只在我们完全补充医疗物资之前就被公会派遣了

original: Then again, our passengers make me uneasy
translate: 再说，我们的乘客让我感到不安

original: Brawl in mess - had to set nose
translate: 在厨房里打斗 - 我不得不处理了一下鼻子

original: Have been sleeping poorly and dreams are... unsound
translate: 睡眠一直不好，梦境……很不真实

original: Igan came to me today with a bite-wound that he sustained whilst working in the hold
translate: 伊甘今天来找我，身上有咬伤，是在货舱工作时受的

original: Didn't see creature and I would say it was a rat's bite if it weren't for the size and some aspect of the dentition that I find hard to explain properly
translate: 没看到那东西，如果不是伤口的大小和一些难以解释的齿痕，我会说那是一只老鼠的咬伤

original: Was visited today by navigator Aslam
translate: 今天来访的是领航员阿斯拉姆

original: He asked for Whitefern - a sedative
translate: 他要了白蕨——一种镇静剂

original: Suspected he was not fully forthcoming and when pushed, he mumbled something about the stars being 'odd'
translate: 我怀疑他没有完全坦白，被追问后，他咕哝着说星星“很奇怪”

original: Not sure what he meant and he left before I could push him further
translate: 我不确定他指的是什么，他离开前没有给我更多解释的机会

original: We cannot maintain our course for Idra
translate: 我们无法继续前往伊德拉

original: Captain advised me today to make ready the surgery and to expect casualties
translate: 船长今天建议我准备好手术，并预期会有伤亡

original: I suspect he intends to inform our passengers that he refuses to land on the island
translate: 我怀疑他打算告知我们的乘客，他拒绝在岛上降落
如果这是我的最后一程

original: A small, leather-bound journal filled with neat handwritten notes
translate: 一本小皮册，里面记录着整洁的手写笔记

original: Noted on the inside cover is the name “Caspar of Loral
translate: 内页上标注的名字是“卡斯帕·洛拉尔”

original: Arrived today and was met by the man who is to be my overseer
translate: 今天抵达，并被那位将要成为我的监工的人迎接

original: He seemed nice enough albeit eccentric
translate: 他看起来还算不错，尽管有些古怪

original: Is this to be my fate as well?
Woe to me that my wretched life and poor choices has landed me, Caspar of Loral, on this barren rock as the keeper of lights
translate: 我的悲惨生活和糟糕的选择将卡斯帕·洛拉尔带到了这荒凉的岩石上，成为了灯塔的守护者

original: Saw lights on the shore near the cave entrance
translate: 在洞口附近看到了岸边的灯光

original: He insists we leave them alone and I am forced to abide, though my mind wanders often to that cave and what may lay within
translate: 他坚持让我们不要去管他们，我虽然不得不遵守，但我的思绪常常飘向那个洞穴及其内部的秘密

original: I cannot take it any more!
The old bastard is driving me mad!
translate: 这老家伙简直让我抓狂！

original: He spies on me and gives me strange looks
translate: 他一直窥视我，还用奇怪的眼神看着我

original: And I’m sure he goes through my things!
translate: 而且我肯定他在翻我的东西！

original: I went for a walk to clear my head and I ended up by the entrance to the sea-cave
translate: 我去散步想放松一下，结果到了海边洞穴的入口

original: I hear it even in my sleep
translate: 即使在梦里我也能听到它

original: About a week before your arrival in Idra
translate: 在你抵达伊德拉之前大约一周

original: Always it calls me to the caves
translate: 每次它都在召唤我去洞穴

original: To the deeper dark that lies beneath where no man has tread for eons
translate: 去那片深邃的黑暗，那里已经数千年无人涉足

original: The looking stone and the ancient sleepers
translate: 观察石和古老的沉睡者

original: Dropped off and told to guard the cargo until it can be collected
translate: 被扔在这里，直到货物被取走，还得看守货物

original: And whilst the bastards up in the northern cave are living the good life I’m stuck in this hole
translate: 而那些混蛋在北方洞穴里过着好日子，我却困在这个破地方

original: I sometimes think the Imperial dungeons would be preferable
translate: 有时我甚至觉得帝国的地牢更好一些

original: We explored the cave today and found what appears to be an underwater tunnel in one of the dead-ends
translate: 今天我们探索了洞穴，发现其中一个死胡同里似乎有一个通往水下的隧道

original: Bryn insisted we try to swim it but I can think of no worse nightmare than being lost in the dark underwater
translate: 布林坚持让我们尝试游泳过去，但我想没有什么比在黑暗的水下迷路更可怕的噩梦了

original: I told him as much and he got agitated
translate: 我这么告诉他，他变得激动起来

original: Yelled something about dreaming of an ancient relic
translate: 他喊着自己曾经梦见了一件古代遗迹

original: I have no idea what he’s on about
Bryn got attacked by a crab the size of a warhound today!
translate: 布林今天被一只比战犬还要大的螃蟹攻击了！
差点把他的腿都咬掉了！

original: Neither of us have seen anything like it before and we can only pray it was alone!
translate: 我们俩之前从未见过这样的东西，只能祈祷它只是单独出现的！

original: Hope the ship won't be delayed much longer
I know in my heart he’s gone to the underwater tunnel
translate: 我知道他一定是去了水下的隧道

original: Shapes are moving in the dark now
translate: 黑暗中有些东西在移动

original: No way out and no one is coming for me!
translate: 没有出路，也没有人来救我！
土豆 - 胡萝卜 - 韭菜

original: All of the above can be found growing in our field
translate: 以上所有都可以在我们的田地里找到
x 鸡蛋 - 土豆 - 洋葱

original: Sea bird eggs will do just fine
A journal that appears to have been written by one of the members of the Cabal expedition
translate: 一本看起来像是某个典礼探险队成员写的日记

original: This one was found in the base-camp
translate: 这本是在基地营地找到的

original: We’ve finally arrived at the Priory and found it in shockingly good condition
translate: 我们终于到达了修道院，并发现它状况出奇的好

original: It’s as if time has stood still here
translate: 就好像时间在这里停滞了一样

original: The initial survey does not reveal a clear means of accessing the lower level but I’m confident we’ll find a way given enough time
translate: 初步调查并未发现通往地下层的明显途径，但给足够的时间，我相信我们会找到方法的
这地方真是令人难以置信

original: It appears to stand as it was left millennia ago
translate: 它似乎就像几千年前留下的那样站立着

original: How it could have slipped so well out of time and history is truly a mystery to me
translate: 它是如何如此完美地脱离了时间和历史，对我来说真是一个谜

original: As is the fate of the Priory’s original occupants
translate: 同样，修道院原始居民的命运也是一个谜

original: Still no success in finding the door to the catacombs
translate: 仍然没有找到通往墓穴的门

original: I can only conclude it’s somehow concealed
translate: 我只能得出结论，它可能是某种方式隐藏的

original: We did, however, make an interesting discovery
translate: 然而，我们确实有一个有趣的发现

original: The four statues on the “pilgrim’s road” can be rotated
translate: “朝圣者之路”上的四座雕像可以旋转

original: I’m certain this is somehow significant!
translate: 我肯定这背后有某种意义！

original: Some form of disease is spreading amongst the men
translate: 一种形式的疾病正在士兵中蔓延

original: Abdominal pain and swelling combined with fevers
Our apothecary is so far at a loss at curing it but suggests that proximity to the fungal growths that started sprouting is a potential vector of infection
translate: 我们的药剂师对此束手无策，但建议这种感染可能是由那些开始生长的菌类造成的

original: I’ve ordered that masks be worn near the growths
translate: 我已经下令在菌类附近佩戴口罩

original: We found a document in the scriptorium with a verse on it!
translate: 在修道院的图书馆里，我们发现了一份手稿，上面有段诗句！

original: The portal had been hidden in plain sight all along - all it took to open it was the correct configuration of the statues!
translate: 通往梦境的门户一直都在我们眼前，只是需要正确的雕像排列就能开启它！
梦境殿堂在等待着我们！

original: A journal that appears to have been written by one of the members of the Cabal expedition that was dispatched to the Priory
translate: 一本似乎是某个派遣到修道院的密谋者探险队成员所写的日记

original: This one was found on a cocooned corpse in the catacombs
translate: 这个是在地窖中茧中包裹的尸体身上发现的
今天我们进入了‘梦境殿堂’

original: I’m awestruck by the mystery of it all
translate: 我被这一切的神秘所震撼

original: What secrets did the Sleeper whisper to the monks as they dreamed?
translate: 沉睡者在梦中向僧侣们诉说了什么秘密？

original: We must push on and soon enough we too shall stand before his timeless glory
translate: 我们必须继续前进，不久我们也会站在他的永恒荣耀之前

original: By the Maiden’s, we found it!
translate: 天之少女啊，我们找到了！

original: The tomb in all its glory
We lost two members to traps trying to enter the room but it’s only a matter of time now
translate: 我们在尝试进入房间时有两名成员触发了陷阱，但现在已经只是时间问题了

original: I know there is something here - calling for us!
translate: 我知道这里有某些东西在召唤我们！

original: There must be some other way?
Several pages are ruined from the fungal infection
translate: 几页纸因霉菌感染而毁坏了

original: to move in and out of the caves and continue excavating the Eternity Gate
translate: 进出洞穴并继续挖掘永恒之门

original: My greatest concern at this point is the rate at which we are losing crew to suicides and infection
translate: 目前我最担心的是船员因自杀和感染而不断减少

original: I saw them change before my very eyes!
translate: 我亲眼目睹了他们的变化！

original: Oh, blessed Maidens I may have escaped for now but I cannot escape the images that now haunt me
translate: 啊，蒙福的女祭司们，我暂时逃过了这一劫，但那些画面却如影随形

original: What’s worse, the entire complex is somehow resealing itself and I’m trapped between the false tomb and the surface level
translate: 更糟糕的是，整个建筑群似乎在自行修复，我被困在假墓和地表之间

original: I can only pray someone is left alive topside to open the gate
translate: 只能祈祷上面还有幸存者能打开大门

original: This one was found on a corpse in the catacombs
translate: 这个是在地窖的尸体上找到的

original: They’ve found the secret passage to some kind of cave below the false tomb
translate: 他们发现了一条通往假墓下方洞穴的秘密通道

original: Something far older than the Priory itself
translate: 比修道院本身还要古老的存在

original: Older than the Empire even is the talk around camp
translate: 比帝国还要古老的传说在营地中流传

original: I just wish my insides didn’t hurt as much
translate: 我只是希望我的内脏不那么痛

original: They’re sending me down with the next shipment of tools
translate: 下一次货物运输时我会和工具一起下去
这意味着要穿过“夜之迷宫”

original: They say it can’t be lit even by magical lighting
translate: 据说即使使用魔法照明也无法照亮它

original: Apparently it’s easy enough to navigate if you know how
translate: 似乎只要知道方法就能轻易导航

original: South until you hit the first wall and then west until wall - north until wall - west until wall - north until wall - west until wall - then north and you’re there
translate: 向南走直到碰到第一面墙，然后向西走直到碰到墙 - 向北走直到碰到墙 - 向西走直到碰到墙 - 向北走直到碰到墙 - 向西走直到碰到墙 - 然后向北走，你就到了

original: I went all the way to the sanctum this time
By the Golden how I wish I had not
translate: 金龙啊，我多么希望我没有去过

original: How can such a thing be?
This recipe requires the following ingredients
translate: 这个食谱需要以下食材

original: You have now learned how to make this recipe
translate: 你现在学会了如何制作这个食谱

original: A bag of highly toxic fungi for Esteban, the alchemist in the Underhalls
translate: 一袋名为埃斯特班的炼金术士在地下厅使用的剧毒真菌

original: A small apparatus that creates smoke
translate: 一个小型装置，可以产生烟雾

original: Used to calm bees before harvesting honey
translate: 用于在采集蜂蜜前安抚蜜蜂

original: A folded up piece of paper that has ‘To Camilla - From Cassilda' written on it
translate: 一张折叠的纸，上面写着“给卡米拉 - 来自卡斯ilda”

original: Supposedly it contains the words of a song intended for Camilla’s eyes only
translate: 据说里面包含了一首只给卡米拉看的歌的歌词

original: A bottle of medicine made by Mother Katak to help cure the infection that is spreading through the Idran refugee camp
translate: 一瓶由卡塔卡母亲为治愈伊德兰难民营中传播的感染而制作的药水

original: A honeycomb retrieved from one of the beehives in Firgol
translate: 从菲戈尔蜂巢中取回的蜂蜡

original: It has a spectacular shade of yellow
translate: 它有着令人惊叹的黄色

original: A strange vessel that could hold liquid
translate: 一个奇怪的容器，可以容纳液体
一个奇怪的容器，里面装着液体
一个小巧破旧的毛绒玩具

original: No doubt it should be returned to its owner with all due haste
translate: 毫无疑问，应该尽快归还给它的主人

original: Something appears to be moving inside
translate: 看起来里面似乎有什么在移动

original: A rounded mallet that seems to have some kind of ceremonial purpose
translate: 一个圆头的榔头，似乎有一定的仪式用途

original: The tragic, mold covered, bones of two children
translate: 两具被霉菌覆盖的儿童骨骼，令人悲伤

original: The kind that might be used for a lighthouse beacon
translate: 可能用于灯塔灯源的那种油

original: A strange octagonal amulet, richly filegreed and with the navigational roset of the Nautical Guild carved on it
translate: 一个奇怪的八角形护身符，表面打磨得非常光滑，并雕刻着海盗公会的航海玫瑰图案

original: This is apparently an item that the guild will pay handsomely to have returned to them
translate: 这显然是一件公会愿意出高价赎回的物品
一本包含罪证信息的账本

original: A pair of weathered stone tablets covered in indecipherable writing and grotesque symbols
translate: 一对风化了的石板，上面刻满了无法辨认的文字和怪异的符号

original: The tablet’s condition seems to indicate that it has rested under the sea for a long time
translate: 这些石板的状况表明它们可能在海底沉睡了很长时间

original: Did you just hear a whisper?
A large quantity of rotted horse flesh
Utterly inedible to humans but perhaps a treat for some other beastie?
translate: 对人类来说完全无法食用，但或许对某些其他生物来说是一道美味？

original: A grotesque looking black Idol found in the 'Santa Fury' treasure hoard
translate: 发现于“Santa Fury”宝藏堆中的一个长相怪异的黑色偶像

original: A small brass badge belonging to a member of the glorious Imperial Sewer-patrol
translate: 一枚属于光荣帝国下水道巡逻队成员的小铜质徽章

original: A small silver flute that can be used to drain the mercury-pool in the Tower of Ash
translate: 一枚可以用来排空灰烬塔中水银池的银笛

original: A collapsed field-telescope used for stargazing
translate: 一台坍塌的望远镜，用于观星

original: One of the ingredients needed to craft the ‘Salts of Elthanyr’
translate: 制作‘艾尔than瑞盐’所需的一种材料

original: A special salt that can apparently be used to unsummon conjured creatures
translate: 据说可以用来解除召唤生物的一种特殊盐

original: Bring it to Calipero the Magos underneath the Tower of Ash
translate: 带给灰塔下的麦格斯·卡拉皮罗

original: A bloodied bronze key that opens something in the crypt under the temple in Horryn
translate: 一串沾有血迹的青铜钥匙，可以打开霍ryn神殿地下的某个密室

original: A small key that unlocks the door to the surgery on the "Zephyr
translate: 一把小型钥匙，可以打开“西风”号上的手术室门

original: A key that was discovered inside the keep in Horryn
translate: 在霍ryn要塞中发现的一把钥匙

original: A large black key that unlocks something inside the Black Priory
translate: 一把大型黑色钥匙，可以打开黑修道院内的某个锁

original: A large rusty key that seems like it would open a chest or some other container
translate: 一把生锈的大钥匙，看起来可以打开一个箱子或其他容器

original: You found it on a drowned corpse beneath the lighthouse
translate: 你在灯塔下的溺水尸体上找到的

original: A thick piece of chitin taken from the exo-skeleton of an unnaturally large creature
translate: 来自某种异常巨大的生物外骨骼的一块厚实的甲壳

original: As chitin dries it can be ground into powder, providing a potent alchemical ingredient
translate: 甲壳干燥后可以磨成粉末，提供一种强大的炼金材料

original: A slimy, curved fang pulled from the mouth of some sort of overgrown monstrosity
translate: 从某种巨大的怪兽口中拔出的一根黏滑的弯曲獠牙

original: The end is still incredibly sharp
Not to be mistaken for their smaller and more edible counterparts
translate: 不要与它们的小巧可食用的同类混淆

original: Whilst these eggs make for a potent alchemical ingredient, ingesting them in any other way can have…unpleasant effects
translate: 尽管这些蛋可以作为强大的炼金材料，但以其他方式食用它们可能会产生…不愉快的效果

original: Called “the King of insects” due to its shimmering emerald scales
translate: 由于其闪烁的翡翠鳞片，被称为“昆虫之王”

original: Its royal title, however, does not keep it safe from the alchemists and artificers who consider it a prized reagent
translate: 然而，它的王冠头衔并不能使它免受炼金术士和工匠们的觊觎，他们视其为珍贵的药剂材料

original: Whilst this small insect is a popular alchemical ingredient, its fire-like sting makes it one of the Empire’s most hated pests
translate: 尽管这种小昆虫是炼金材料中受欢迎的选择，但它像火焰般的刺痛使它成为帝国最恨的害虫之一

original: Often found growing on graves, the roots of this weed are believed to feed on the flesh of the dead
translate: 经常生长在坟墓上的这种杂草的根部被认为会吸取死者的肉

original: For this reason it is despised by grave-keepers and much sought after by those who dabble in the arcane
translate: 因此，它被坟墓看守者憎恶，并受到那些涉足奥秘之术的人的追捧

original: This small fern is often found growing near streams or in the deeper parts of the forest
translate: 这种小蕨类植物通常生长在溪流附近或森林深处

original: It emits a fresh, pleasant scent
translate: 它散发出清新宜人的香气

original: A large, leathery ear cut from the freshly dead head of some monstrous hound
translate: 这是从某些怪兽狗的刚死头部割下的大块皮革耳朵

original: A delicate flower that is said to grow on the sites of battles over the graves of dead soldiers
translate: 一种据说生长在战场遗址上的花朵，这些战场位于阵亡士兵的墓地附近

original: They say beauty lies in the eye of the beholder, but the slick goo coating this lizard’s eye gives you some doubts
translate: 有人说美在眼中有其独到之处，但覆盖在这只爬虫眼睛上的滑腻黏液却让你有些怀疑

original: Still, the rarity of reptilians throughout the Empire’s inner cities means it should fetch a decent price
translate: 不过，帝国内部城市中爬虫类生物的稀有性意味着它应该能卖出不错的价钱

original: Believed to be at the core of all metals, this liquid element is a commodity amongst alchemists and is as fast working as it is toxic
translate: 人们相信汞是所有金属的核心，这种液态元素是炼金师们交易的商品，其作用之快与毒性一样令人震惊

original: A small pinkish mushroom that is sometimes found in caves
translate: 一种粉红色的小蘑菇，有时可以在洞穴中发现

original: Though eating it will cause acute vomiting, it is a valuable alchemical agent when used properly
translate: 虽然食用它会导致剧烈呕吐，但正确使用时它是一种有价值的炼金剂

original: The Glowman is so called for its faint bioluminescence
translate: 由于其微弱的生物发光，人们称其为发光人

original: It grows naturally in damp cave-systems and it a commonly used alchemical ingredient
translate: 它自然生长在潮湿的洞穴系统中，是一种常用的炼金成分

original: Easily recognizable with its red cap and white spots, the Laughtercap is not to be ingested as it is said to cause hysterical laughter and odd visions
translate: 由于其红色的帽盖和白色斑点，笑帽菇很容易被辨认，但切勿食用，因为它据说会导致歇斯底里的笑声和奇异的幻象

original: Many an apprentice alchemist has ignored this warning through the ages
translate: 无数学徒炼金师在历史上都无视了这个警告

original: Whilst this jelly-like substance may look harmless, its properties have been known to create potions just as acidic as the creature it comes from
translate: 虽然这种胶质物质看起来无害，但它的特性可以制造出与该生物一样酸性的药剂

original: Do not, under any circumstances, ingest
translate: 任何情况下都不要食用

original: Rats are so ubiquitously despised throughout the Empire that certain merchants will pay a bounty for their tails
translate: 在帝国中，老鼠被普遍憎恶，以至于某些商人会为它们的尾巴支付悬赏
同样的，某些炼金师也会支付悬赏

original: Whilst most citizens of the Empire would be disgusted by its presence, this larva-like insect can be useful to those who know what to do with it
translate: 尽管帝国的大多数市民会对它的存在感到厌恶，但这种类似幼虫的昆虫对知道如何利用它的人来说还是很有用的

original: An aggressive mold known to eat almost any organic material it comes into contact with, this mold has cost more than a few citizens their cheese cellars
translate: 这种好战的霉菌几乎可以吞噬接触到的任何有机物质，它已经让不少市民失去了他们的奶酪储藏室

original: This rare, luminescent scale was likely taken from some sort of giant lizard or sea creature
translate: 这种罕见的发光角质很可能来自某种巨型蜥蜴或海洋生物

original: Whilst it is primarily used as an alchemical ingredient, its beauty makes it a popular ingredient amongst artisans on the Outer Isles
translate: 尽管它主要用作炼金材料，但它的美丽使其成为外群岛工匠们非常受欢迎的材料

original: Typically given as a gift to those in grief
translate: 通常作为礼物送给那些处于悲痛中的人

original: It is said that if the plant is placed near your bed it will gorge on your despair, offering some slight respite
translate: 据说如果将这种植物放在床边，它会吞噬你的绝望，提供一点小小的慰藉

original: Though it may be light in weight, it is not light in use
translate: 尽管它重量轻，但用途却很重

original: This silky ingredient has been used in a variety of potion recipes for centuries and is popular amongst the Empire’s finest alchemists
translate: 这种丝质材料被用于各种炼金配方中已有数百年历史，深受帝国顶级炼金师的喜爱

original: Unfortunately, the same cannot be said for the creature that spins it
translate: 不幸的是，同样不能说这种制造它的生物也是如此

original: Named due to an old wives’ tale in which flowers began to grow at the site of a fallen star, this white plant is often given between lovers as a sign of affection
translate: 由于一种古老的老婆子的传说，即花朵在陨星坠落之处生长，这种白色植物常被恋人之间作为表达爱意的礼物赠送

original: Sometimes called the Heart of Life by alchemists across the Empire, this element is known to be extremely flammable yet alchemically potent
translate: 在帝国的炼金术士中，有时称其为生命之心，这种元素以其极高的易燃性和炼金效力而闻名

original: Often found growing in areas of direct sunlight, these bright flowers are often used as decoration during the summer solstice
translate: 经常在直射阳光下生长，这些明亮的花朵常在夏至期间作为装饰使用

original: A huge tusk pried from the jaws of a monstrous hog
translate: 从怪物野猪的口中撬出的巨大獠牙

original: For those who are brave or foolish enough to hunt such creatures, this useful alchemical ingredient makes a fine prize
translate: 对于那些勇敢或愚蠢到敢于猎杀此类生物的人来说，这种有用的炼金材料会成为极好的战利品

original: A rather foul smelling sack removed from some kind of venomous animal
translate: 从某种有毒动物身上取出的一种散发着难闻气味的袋子

original: The liquid inside does not look much better than it smells
translate: 腐蚀性的液体气味同样令人作呕

original: Judging by the rotten scent emitting from this shriveled hand, it was likely cut from the wrist of a freshly risen ghoul
translate: 根据这腐烂的气味判断，这只干瘪的手很可能是从新复活的尸鬼手腕上割下的

original: Though desecration of the dead is taboo in Imperial society, the many uses for a ghoul’s flesh nonetheless causes it to fetch a hefty price on the black markets
translate: 尽管在帝国社会中亵渎死者的行径是禁忌，但尸鬼肉的多种用途使其在黑市上仍能卖个好价钱

original: Fellbells emit a soft, mesmerizing chime that seems to attract mushroom-pickers and animals alike
translate: 跌落铃发出柔和、催眠般的铃声，似乎能吸引蘑菇采摘者和动物

original: Unfortunately it is also highly poisonous
translate: 不幸的是，它也非常有毒

original: A common variety of quartz often believed to offer enlightenment, this gemstone is often found in the mountains of Gorremia
translate: 常见的石英品种，人们普遍认为它能带来启迪，这种宝石在戈雷米亚山脉中很常见

original: A common gemstone across the Empire
Crones will tell you it protects the user from bad luck
translate: 老妪会告诉你它能保护使用者免受厄运

original: A highly coveted semi-precious stone often worn by members of the lay-nobility
translate: 这种半宝石常被贵族阶层成员佩戴，因其珍贵而备受青睐

original: This adularescent gem is believed by some to have fallen from the moon itself, but its low cost suggests otherwise
translate: 这种反光宝石被认为是从月亮上掉下来的，但其低廉的价格表明并非如此

original: This semi-precious stone is found in far Arassha and is often inset in items of power
translate: 这种半宝石在遥远的阿拉莎发现，常被镶嵌在强大的物品中

original: A rare mineral often misidentified as a ruby, this gemstone is often called “The Jewler’s Best Friend
translate: 这种稀有矿物常被误认为是红宝石，宝石商们称它为“珠宝商的挚友”

original: A spherical stone, typically white or bluish-gray, the pearl is a favorite of rich sea-merchants
translate: 这种球形宝石通常呈白色或蓝灰色，是富有的海商的最爱

original: An extremely rare and coveted gemstone that can sometimes be found inset in the regalia of the Empire’s most powerful
translate: 这种极其稀有且备受追捧的宝石有时会被镶嵌在帝国最强大的人物的权杖上

original: A coveted, durable gemstone often worn by Magi of high rank
translate: 这种珍贵耐用的宝石常被高阶法师佩戴

original: Topaz is commonly traded by Ombarian merchants
translate: 拳石在奥姆巴里安商人中常见交易

original: Usually light blue in color, the gem can be traded at a low cost
translate: 通常呈浅蓝色，宝石可以以较低的价格交易

original: Finely carved from whale-bone, these combs provide a small modicum of luxury to the women and long-haired men of the Outer Isles
translate: 这些鲸骨精心雕刻而成的梳子为外岛的女性和长发男性提供了一丝奢华感

original: A small collection of mismatched buttons
You can hear the sea in them
translate: 你可以听到海浪的声音

original: A clay vessel commonly used to hold wine
translate: 一种常用的陶制容器，用来盛酒

original: A vessel used by locals from which wine or ale is drunk
translate: 一种当地人用来饮用葡萄酒或麦芽酒的容器

original: A tool used by followers of the Imperial faith to prepare the dead for burial
translate: 一种由帝国信仰信徒使用，用于准备死者入殓的工具

original: A small metal hook used by locals to catch a variety of fish
translate: 一种小型金属钩，当地人用来捕捉各种鱼类

original: A small bone or wood instrument
translate: 一种小型骨制或木制乐器

original: Though a good knife and fingers will suffice for most of the Empire's citizens, it simply will not do for a small select elite
translate: 尽管帝国大多数市民可以用好的刀和手指来完成大部分工作，但对于一小部分精挑细选的精英来说，这远远不够

original: A spherical piece of glass sometimes used by islanders/locals to create jewelry or fool children
translate: 一种有时被岛民或当地人用来制作首饰或愚弄孩子的玻璃球

original: A beaten up and ugly, albeit well crafted, tin goblet
translate: 一个虽然做工精细但又破又丑的锡制杯子

original: A glass vessel half full of rich Ombarian ink
translate: 一个半满的玻璃容器，里面装着浓郁的奥姆贝里安墨水

original: Likely used for the Empire's drink of choice
translate: 很可能用来盛帝国最受欢迎的饮品

original: A cutting tool commonly used by local farmers to shear their meager flocks
translate: 一种常见的剪切工具，当地农民常用它来剪他们微不足道的羊群

original: A piece from a set of pieces belonging to the game “Lancers
translate: 来自“骑兵”棋盘游戏的一枚棋子

original: Commonly used by members of nobility to check their appearance, these handheld items are believed by some to be ‘mirrors to the soul’
translate: 由贵族成员常用以检查仪容，有些人认为这些手持物品是“灵魂的镜子”

original: A pitcher used for serving drinks
A tin plate used for serving meals
Finely spun cloth is difficult to produce and highly coveted among the tailors of the Heartlands
translate: 精致的丝绸难以生产，是心腹之地裁缝们极力追求的物品

original: Not as expensive as it's finer counterpart, but still a local commodity
translate: 比其更精细的版本便宜一些，但仍然是当地的商品

original: A common household item often found in dining areas
translate: 一种常见的家用物品，常出现在餐桌上

original: A brass pin sometimes used by commonfolk to hold various garments in place
translate: 一种黄铜别针，常被普通人用来固定各种衣物

original: A small carving made from walrus teeth
translate: 用齿鲸牙制成的小雕刻品

original: An empty glass bottle that has taken on a green tint
translate: 一个空玻璃瓶，带有绿色的色调

original: The exoskeleton of various sea creatures, these shells are sometimes used by locals to create jewelry
translate: 各种海洋生物的外骨骼，这些贝壳有时被当地人用来制作首饰

original: A toy made from smooth yew, these doll’s are popular gifts given to local children
translate: 这些木偶由光滑的山毛榉制成，是送给当地儿童的流行礼物

original: A tool commonly used in the weaving of tapestries
translate: 一种常用于挂毯编织的工具

original: This one appears to be made from the wood of the Yew Trees often found in the Outer Isles
translate: 这个似乎是由外群岛常见的山毛榉木制成的

original: You wonder how many fortunes have fallen prey to its faded numbers
translate: 你不禁好奇它那褪色的数字曾让多少命运蒙羞

original: A popular writing tool made from the feather of a large bird
translate: 一种流行的书写工具，由大型鸟类的羽毛制成

original: This one appears to need sharpening
A yarn of wool spun from the shag of the sturdy breed of goats that roam the hills in the Outer Isles
translate: 这种羊毛线由外群岛山坡上那些结实品种的山羊身上长出的毛纺制而成
